title.pack: GANGTOK 3 N / 4 D

subtitle.name: GANGTOK 3 N / 4 D
subtitle.tit: If you are looking for a memorable Sikkim trip, holiday packages are the right choice for you. Golden Wings offers the widest range of customizable Puri tour to suit every kind of traveler.Bruges hotels can be pricey but there are plenty of B&Bs, guest houses, rentals and hostels for reasonable rates. Some of the hostels offer private rooms as well as the cheaper dormitories. Before booking note that some establishments include breakfast and others charge astronomical prices for the extra breakfast. You may also find yourself paying a surcharge if you stay only one night. Recommended budget accommodation in Bruges includes Bonobo Apart Hotel, Hotel Bla Bla, Hotel de Goezeput and St. Christopher’s Bauhaus, Woodside Bed and Breakfast, Snuffel Hostel and Lybeer Travelers Hostel. You can eat-for-cheap in Bruges by avoiding eateries on Markt Square and Burg Square. Be careful not to be charged for “free” bread put on your table or for tap water.
